This is not review bombing review. Switching from Battle net to Steam is a downgrade against all odds. They may have integrated it so well adding profile search, extra badge, achievements and whatnot. BUUUUUUT, on battle net you could have a different display and audio language for the game, on Steam this option doesn't exist, which is a big downgrade, I hate it and thus this game should be played on Battle net for best experience thus I can't recommend it here.

And speaking about review bombing game is still good, people are salty, rightfully so, I am too, but game isn't bad, just not as good as it used to be.

Наё6ка года от Близзардов. 
Интересно как так получилось часть вроде вторая а ощущается как ДАУНгрейд.
В этой игре отталкивает абсолютно всё, Я никогда не уходил из первого Овервотча всегда был рад поиграть во время ивентов и событий с друзьями. Но об Овервотч 2 вспоминается только плохое. Баланс гавно, Миллион багов и проблем на старте будь то текстуры через которые можно провалиться или бесконечные очереди по часу. Система репортов и Античита которые бесполезные, Ей богу вы можете обозвать всех тиммейтов уродами и встать на спавне, Вам за это НИЧЕГО не будет(Я таким не занимался честна). Античит здесь говенный, Вы можете напороться на Солдата который будет бегать и стрелять всем в голову фулл магазин и он так будет бегать около месяца или больше(Инфа с личного опыта и с Офф.Форума). 

Баланс. Самые популярные герои самые сильные вот и всё.
Привожу пример Нерф Турбосвина который мало чем поменялся с ОВ1 и Нерф Сомбры которую сделали играбельной на старте ОВ2. Эти персонажи не особо популярные их мейнят и играют Процентов 5 от всех игроков. А вот когда Нерфнули Мерси/Ангела Добавив ей буквально 1 секунду кд на абилку. Вы не представляете как это Кон4енное комьюнити заныло и начало писать Близзард куда только можно. Нерф Оправданный, Но 20% от всех игроков которые Мейнят Мерси так  не считают. И что делают Близзарды? Откатывают Нерфы и даже Баффают и без того сильного Персонжа. ГеЙнИаЛьНо.

Новые Герои. Самые нормальные вышедшие герои в ОВ2 это Раматтра и Джанкеркуиин, у них есть Харизма они интересные и привлекательные. Ведь они были в Лоре еще в первом ОВ. Остальные 4 это такие неинтересные пустышки. Та же Соджорн она даже не выглядит интересно и у персонажа просто нету Харизмы, от всех ее реплик хочется спать.

Добавлять героев в платный Батл пасс которые не окупается и сделать все легендарные скины по 20 Долларов это отдельная тупая тема. 
 
Минус 2 танк в тиме. Все говорят что это было сделано потому-что бои были нудными и не динамичными потому-что танки прикрывали всю команду щитами и что якобы Файты были далбежкой в щиты. Я вот вообще не понимаю этих людей, Да! Были сезоны где была мета щитов, Брали только Сигму,Райна и Орису у которых щиты были по 2-3к хп, и они еще друг за другом его меняли. Но вы играли в игру в последнем сезоне ОВ1? Этой меты давно уже нету. И я не понимаю зачем было убирать 6 игрока в тиме(Чем больше тем веселее ведь). А теперь эти 5 на 5 превратились в бесконечные драки где никто не умирает, достаточно динамично для вас? Саппортом намного легче теперь хилить когда нет 2-го танка.  Тем более близзарды До сих пор балансят отсуствие шестого игрока.

Комьюнити максимально мерзкое ведь за токсичность вас тут не забанят, Видимо из-за того что нет 6-го игрока теперь недостаточно репортов, и зная близзард наверное так оно и есть. Нет вы представляете? Они добавляют в свою новую игру с цифрой 2 с апдейтами все то что было в первой части и еще преподносят это будто бы они действительно чем-то там занимаются кроме создания скинов по 20 бачей.

Режим Робот. Хуё6от, это самый унылый режим что можно придумать, Я бы лучше на Анубисе или Ханамуре пытался запушить ласт точку под спавном чем толкать этого е6у4его робота. Очень Динамично да? Эти матчи с роботом очень редко заканчивается тем что вы его довели до конца, это бывает только в тех случаях когда 1 команда превосходит другую. Просто очень интересно бежать к роботу миллион лет на зеркальной карте. А ведь еще Близзарды этот е6учий режим не хотят удалять или сделать хотяб галочку чтобы можно было убрать этот режим из пула. Н-е-е-е-е-е-т, вы думали все будет так просто? Они сделали приоритет чтобы карты с этим ублюдским роботом попадались чаще ведь карт всего 3 в отличии от других режимов. И как же классно было попадаться по 3-4 раза подряд на этот нудный режим и играть на одних и тех же 3 картах. 

Отмена ПВЕ кампании это вообще 3.14здец. Ведь ОВ2 должен был быть именно про это лол. Я вот не понимаю как после такого люди вообще в эту игру играют, разрабы просто срут в рот всем. И главное они отменили ПВЕ ни каким-нибудь там постом или еще чем-то. Они отменили кампанию в каком-то подкасте которые даже никто не смотрит.

Выводы. Не тратьте тут время. Онлайн в этой игре настолько упал что игроки с рангом Даймонд попадают в ТОП-500. А ведь дальше Даймонда ведь есть Мастер, Грандмастер и только потом уже ТОП-500. А вы думали они просто так выпустили игру в стиме? Нет, Онлайн упал и они хотят привлечь еще аудиторию чтобы срубить бабла. 

Лично я считаю что Близзарды уволили абсолютно всех разрабов которые делали эту игру после бунтов о том что кто-то был не в том месте, не в то время (Джесси МакКри разраб), и по перепискам 10-ти летней давности тоже там много когт уволили. А Джефф к сожалению ушел оттуда сам(Наверное видя что там происходит). По итогу там остались только бездари которые только и могут что придумывать сексуальные ориентации героям и делать ивент к Прайду. А ну и создавать ИИ который оценивает внешний вид персонажа для ЛГБТ комьюнити ведь это ОчЕнЬ вАжНа. А эту игру я даже не скачивал в стиме, я накрутил Ачивмент Анлокере 15 минут игры и оставил негативный отзыв мб Близзарды заметят. Ведь нигде нельзя оставить негативный отзыв к этой игре. В Батл нете ничего такого нету, На официальном форуме сидят только игроки. А когда я задал вопрос на реддите когда они отвечали на них, о том что у них система репортов сломанная, то мой коммент ПРОСТО УДАЛИЛИ. Самые худшие разработчики бтв. 

FUСК YOU BLIZZARD!

As someone who purchased the game back in 2016 I can save that Im deeply dissapointed into the state its in right now, dishonest dev team, the "PVE" is a fraction of what was promised (And it'll stay that way) and to top it all off abusing their IP into bad, unrewarding, selfish acts of making us pay absurd prices for a single skin, that and for a half battle pass that maybe has 2-3 skins that are kinda nice.

I downloaded this on steam only to put this review and now deleting this game, thank you all for reading this.

Instalei a versão da Steam mas não irei ficar jogando, só fiz isso para postar alguns pequenos registros que eu tinha perdido no meu PC, pelo menos os que eu consegui encontrar. 

OW foi bom pra mim enquanto durou. Essa conversão de jogo Premium para Free 2 Play foi... 

Antes mesmo do "2" lançar eu já tinha me preparado para me despedir da minha conta, pois sentia o rumo que o jogo ia tomar. Eu tinha uma conta bacaninha até, cheia de skins raras, 2 mil horas de jogo e etc. Fiz isso com uma baita dor no coração, mas foi necessário, afinal eu tinha investido muito tempo jogando e eu tinha que "recuperar" algo de volta.

Sobre o dois:

Joguei por 2 semanas quando saiu e já parei de jogar assim que me despedi da minha conta. O segundo contado foi agora, meio curto, ainda nem joguei o Archives que está disponível, mas com passar dos dias pretendo jogar, bem casual, pois a bad vem forte quando me lembro dos...

Vou deixar minha "análise" positiva sim! O jogo me divertiu muito enquanto durou. Passei momentos incríveis, momentos que jamais irei esquecer, sou muito grato por tudo que o jogo me proporcionou.
Installs OW2, boots up game, looks at menu, closes game & uninstalls, gg!

TF2 is one of the most fun games ever. OW2 is just a good game. It is not TF2 and if you expect tf2, you will be disappointed. The monetization scheme is sad and sorry like most live service games. Otherwise, I like playing it with my friends. Its much more competitively focused so playing alone will often leave you feeling frustrated unless your team is willing to communicate. I really enjoy the different characters and playstyles that come with them. The game is also visually just very pretty. I would give it a shot if you're interested, but also try to get a friend to join you.

Наиграв в замечательную, но под конец 21 года умирающую первую часть около 3к+ часов, буквально живя в игре, видеть как "Вторая часть" овера скатилась в абсолютную помойку, где из тебя пытаются высосать гроши всеми доступными методами, отказ от своих обещаний насчет пве и не только, ужасную ранкед систему и проблемы с серверами, мне жаль, что я вообще вижу это убогое наследие некогда легендарной игры. 3+ года без обновлений были лучше, чем то, что происходит с игрой сейчас...

small indie company

AHAHAHAHA I HAVE WAITED FOR THIS EXACT MOMENT. I WAITED ALMOST MY ENTIRE OW LIFE FOR THIS GAME FOR THIS TO BE ON STEAM AND NOW THAT IT IS, I CAN FINALLY LET THE WORLD KNOW HOW I FEEL ABOUT THIS GAME. IT SUX SUX SUX AND IT MAKES MY BRAIN GO AHHHHHHHHH
Let me explain, I played this game around 2017 when the game was "good". I recently came from Minecraft when I felt that the game that I loved wasn't the game that I initially fell in love with (Déjà vu) and I immdiately fell in love. Great game at the time, fun times and memories yada yada yada you get the picture. Genji main who stuck in low ranks, wanting to be the very best after seeing a certain Genji youtuber (you know the one) slices and ults the entire team. Thankfully that dream died a long time ago along with a box of other broken dreams but still, having fun playing a training mode for Exp and fun (I paid my $60) & eventually meeting some good friends. I instead found a new goal of wanting to work at my profile and wanting the max border possible but you don't want to hear about it. What made me change my mind? The sheer obvious balance changes that the community couldn't agree on. New chars (Doomfist was the first added hero they added when I played) while I don't personally hate them, all genuinely have a problem. Moira is a great example. My friend who optimizes Moira (shoutout to T.C.) explained to me one day why Moira is a throw pick technically around higher ranks because she doesn't have any utility other than damage or heal while Ana has sleep, nade, and boost Mercy, has rez, etc but at lower ranks, can easily dominate because people don't know how to counter her. It amazes me how rushed and unrefined most of these heroes are, but they just care about the OWL... as yes the OWL... The Overwatch League is a league where Blizzard tried so hard to make a success. A league filled with people who don't have an idea how to run a proper league. I will say, when the OWL was on Twitch, everything was so simple. Moving to YouTube and having to watch with your bnet or watching now with a YouTube account specifically linked to your bnet and you can't have a business Google account and have to have a specific Google account makes it complicated to watch and earn points, I would rather buy a skin that I like (if I wanted too, not that I have any skins that I like that I don't own). I never really had any desire to watch people better than me compete for something because...Well, I stopped caring. There are plenty of videos of sweaty men in one room focusing on hard work, showing teamwork, and being rewarded when they finish I have seen in my days *ahem* The part that I don't enjoy is the fact that Blizzard seemed to have forgotten the 98% of the player base with content, and of course balancing... Anyone can tell you that GOATS was the most annoying team to face, and if you didn't mirror it, you'd get rolled over. The devs who had no clue how to balance this just kept buffing DPS and nerfing the Tanks affected but it was still there. No matter how hard Blizzard tried to nerf (in once in a blue moon), the meta was still there and the only option was for them to add Role Q.
Role queue was in my opinion one of, if not the least most controversial update. Some people liked it because you HAD to play with Tanks and healers, no more than 6 DPS (sad), and some people hated it because dps queue times. I hate it with a burning passion because of how streamlined the game is. Let me rephrase, the way they implemented it is the way I hated it. I could have possibly gotten used to it, but they just added it as a last-ditch effort to make the game watchable for the OWL. They could have reworked some DPS into tanks and support, and balanced some heroes that obviously could have benefited from it, but no. So much for creativity! It also made Comp too more annoying if someone who cares about getting the maximum comp points in a game has to play a role they aren't comfortable and you're at a disadvantage. Another thing is splitting the ranks into individual roles, at least the way they implemented it was horrible also because you can have someone Top 500 in their main role, and Bronze in the other 2 roles as a joke (nice one). After so many seasons of the same thing, there is no purpose to playing comp or keeping grinding once you've done it all. I mean sure you can aim for the leaderboard, & have a cool spray and icon, but... after that, what's the point? There is no reward or motivation for someone to keep playing comp other than lackluster rewards and some comp points, but nothing meaningful. Despite all of this, what kept me going and playing during these dark and troubled times was leveling my border and aiming for that max diamond border because, to me, that felt like an accomplishment. Finally aiming for something you've been working hard. I didn't care about Sr or glory/fame from smarter people, I cared about leveling my border so that people in the game can go, "WOW this person played a lot, they're so dedicated" or "I hate facing you, you're the final boss of OW" and after even hitting my goal I wasn't done yet. During that time when there was NO CONTENT after 2020 and NOTHING TO DO, I started to hate the stale of it, waking up every day playing a dull game that but despite all of this, I was still under the impression that when OW2 would come out, the borders would continue and that I leveled 600..no 1,200 levels(totaling my time to 6k hours today) after 3001 thinking that there would be some cool border. Even though that early on, they announced borders would be gone that I would still be awarded for my work. I had every obtainable loot boxed skin with an extra 300k ow credits saved up thinking that I would use these for OW2. I was filled with hope and determination that Ow 2 would bring my love back for this game. 
Yeah, that was a lie and it was all for nothing :) Ow 2 was prob the worst thing that Blizzard has ever done with this game and I even miss the GOAT era days, heck I miss the no-content days bc that was more fun than the horrible shell of a game that exists today. My skin collection will never be complete now because I am 2 poor to afford these horrible excuses for a skin price, and since FOMO is a tactic, will prob never appear again (unless in the shop in 2099). My border which I worked so hard for, was reduced to only being seen in your career profile with no way to progress it, replaced by some horrible Battle pass grinding which itself is also stupid & frustrating to grind. I used to look forward to recycled events and look forward to doing my chores of "winning 9 games for an epic skin", but now, I don't even care. Everything that I've cared for is gone for the sake of "convenience". The little things like I can't type when loading or bugs that should not have been a thing day 1 (on fire being not there until recently) should not have been a thing. But the shop magically always works! This new hero progression is not the same thing as Borders it's in my opinion a lot worst because the "reason" Borders were gone was "players of high level were being bullied for playing too much and being in x rank" or something like that when I think hero progression is going to do the same thing, if not worst, especially with an off-meta character, and of course how could I forget the broken promise of PVE :) Unfortunately, every time I load up this game, the song of Viva la Vida and a wave of depression would hit me making me question my purpose in life and make me suffer a midlife crisis. Every time I genuinely play the game, I suffer the 6 stages of grief while in queue and in the hero selection screen.

TLDR: Sop Story don't try this game. I wouldn't recommend this game to my worst enemy, although they probably still love this game like the mindless drone they are lel.

[h1]Сколько тут развелось малолетних дебилов обзорах?[/h1]

Воды много не буду. Играю в овер с 2021 года, подсадила одна из бывших тян. А вообще с ней, произошло первое знакомство [spoiler]на чёрно-оранжевом ютубе.[/spoiler]

[h1]Сразу к делу[/h1]

[b]В первый овер заходил в игру раз в неделю и на ивенты, ради фарма контейнеров, только в командную схватку, так как там не было eбучих танков[/b]

[b]Во второй овер захожу почти каждый день, ради самого ГЕЙплея. Нету обоссанной долбёжки в щиты, игра стала динамичной. Если я захочу пассивный долбление [strike]в зад[/strike], я пойду поиграю в Осаду или Хант, этой игре он не идёт. Ну и естественно, в овере 2 добавили моего мейн персонажа. И вообще, овер (2) - это первая онлайн игра, где я ранкед попробовал и даже дошёл до мастера.[/b]

Единственное огорчение - монетизация, уж слишком она жадная. Про региональные цены близзы не, не слышали. Хотя  в любом случае, сейчас большинство игр такие, та же R6S. 

[h1]Хоть близзард и тупорылые, что закрыли доступ к этой игре населению с России и Беларуси.[/h1]

Но это не отменяет того факта, во первых - они до сих пор делают контент на русском языке. Во-вторых - в стиме моментально пофиксили баг с DLC. В третьих - в стиме даже жители "ограниченных" стран могут играть в Overwatch.
 
Для людей не пробовавших данный продукт - [b]рекомендую попробовать[/b]. Кого-то затянет, а кому-то не зайдёт. Как говорится - у всех разные вкусы.

[h1]Так что негативные обзорщики - IDITE NAXYI[h1] 

P.S. [spoiler]Комменты для вас открыты [/spoiler]

Да, конечно теперь добавили какой-то сраненький сюжет и испытания, но камон для этого стоило переиздавать старую игру на том же движке и с тем же графеном? [spoiler] смешно [/spoiler]

[h1] O mesmo jogo 2 [/h1]

Parece que a Blizzard se rendeu à última tentativa de sobreviver com seu projeto de maior sucesso que se tornou o seu maior fracasso, e que lentamente caminha rumo à direção de ser uma das maiores piadas do mundo dos jogos (como se já não fosse).
Agora precisamos investir mais de 100 dinheiros de verdade em uma skin, sendo que você conseguia facilmente após subir de nível ou juntando suas moedinhas de mentira. Também precisamos desbloquear os heróis por PASSE DE BATALHA, e isso é uma coisa que nem Paladins faz...
Pra quem comprou o primeiro jogo (como eu) teve o grande reconhecimento de seu investimento monetário e tempo gasto, recebendo assim um grande 𝙁𝙊𝘿𝘼-𝙎𝙀 no "segundo" jogo, que era a promessa de pegar tudo o que tinha no primeiro e adicionar os modos PVE, como se já não fosse possível fazer isso dentro do jogo antes. A minha maior felicidade foi ver que as moedas que eu tinha foram convertidas e pesos cubanos, que não são capazes de se quer comprar um chaveirinho aviadado nesse jogo de maricas, que literalmente te punem automaticamente por dizer "jogo lixo" no chat (história real). Além de ter a tendência a seguir o mesmo rumo do primeiro jogo, possuindo modos repetidos todo santo ano, mostrando a preguiça e descaso com o jogo, o que vale mencionar dos mapas que foram literalmente lançados inacabados.
Resta agora esperar pelos ultimo meses de vida desse jogo que está respirando por aparelhos na Steam (que era a única salvação possível) e que está sendo sustentado pela comunidade abobalhada e fielmente idiota que ele tem.
Mas se aprendemos uma coisa sobre esse jogo durante todos esses anos é que a melhor coisa que ele nos trouxe foi uma incrível coletânea de hentais feitos pela comunidade.

Can’t believe I’m actually doing this…

Dear TF2 players (specifically the ones looking for trouble):

If you’re here to compare player counts, it’s not really fair to compare the small percentage of Overwatch players who switched from battle.net/switch/xbox/playstation to Steam with literally every active TF2 player (especially when you still need a battle.net account to play). If you’re here to bash OW2 for being in a poor state, then you’ll have to explain the whole “saveTF2'' campaign, begging Valve to update TF2. If you’re here to say that OW copied TF2, I’d urge you to watch mossbag’s video (https://youtu.be/So9E1egsaHU?si=nTzKxc9eyqBkXG36) on what exactly copying is when it comes to video games, as well as knowing that the two only share the same genre, and do things very differently past that. If you’re here to say that your game is better (which I have no opinion on that matter), then you, not me, will have to ask yourself why you’ve been on about that for the last 7-8 years. 

I will admit, I have played both OW games (even though they’re still too similar to really be considered different games) more than TF2 combined. However, due to me being a bit of a casual for both games, I’ve been able to spectate both fandoms from an outside view, while keeping my bias to a minimum. And let me say, this conflict is not pretty… Now, I know that a large percentage of both fandoms have nothing to do with this conflict. However, I feel like there’s a lot more TF2 fans than OW fans that are fueling this unneeded dumpster fire of an argument. And what for? Because some people, mainly TF2 content creators and other TF2 fans who tried Overwatch in 2015 (for beta), as well as post-launch, called the game the “TF2 killer.” Ever since then, there has been a constant, relentless onslaught of TF2 players spreading hatred on this game. It also didn’t help that some trolls also joined in, to get the two to hate each other more. For a while, OW fans did fight back, but eventually, most just stopped caring. They just let yall constantly spew hate via normal text as well as memes about the two franchises being portrayed in an imaginary battle via having both logos on two different characters fighting, and pretty much always being the one representing TF2 having a flawless victory over Overwatch. But something that I’ve noticed is that most Overwatch fans don’t even pay attention to these memes, to the point that some OW fans who are oblivious to all of this mentioned that they would like a TF2 collab. They just go on about their lives, not giving the attention that yall want from them. As I’ve seen some say, yall have become more obsessed with the Overwatch franchise than they could ever be.

As some people have used personification to put defining games of a genres as members of family (I most often see Metroid and Castlevania being described as the grandmother and grandfather of metroidvanias), when it comes to shooters I see Doom as the grandfather and TF2 and Overwatch as two of its many children (the other children being different kinds of shooters, not just pvp). Now, as many of us know, no family is perfect, and it's nearly impossible to like every aspect of another, or to always get along with another. The most well known example is Mario of Nintendo and Sonic of SEGA. The two grandparents of platformers were fighting tooth and nail with each other. But eventually, the two were able to put aside their differences,  and be able to support each other- and even had several games together- not just smash bros, but also their olympic games series. Another example of rivalry in the video game industry is playstation vs xbox, and eventually console vs pc "master race." It was often argued which one is best in various situations, and overall. Many took sides and did what they could to prove their own superiority, while constantly bashing the other side(s). But in the end, the conflict mostly died out after realizing that we're all people who enjoy video games, in different ways or for different reasons. There's no reason to hate another for not liking your favorite game or platform, or even for liking another game more than your favorite game or platform.

As we all know, the two games are completely different, and Overwatch was not made to compete with TF2 (even though many refuse to believe or admit that). But even if they were, that would not be a bad thing per-se. When a rivalry or competition is healthy, it can push and encourage both or all sides, depending on how many are competing, to try and do better than the others- and to show the target audience why they should be given your money or time. However, if there is no competition, it can allow the company to do pretty much whatever they want- since they know that there is no alternative, so the user is stuck with them. This is how many feel with companies like YouTube- where overall user satisfaction has been plummeting over the years from bad decision after bad decision (removing features like visible dislikes, increasing costs of its premium service, banning ad blockers, allowing ads that are scams or [redacted], etc), but knowing that there is no one for users to switch to. Competition is necessary to avoid monopolies, give more choice to consumers, and overall improve industries.

Unfortunately, I know that only a small percentage of TF2 fans who are here to review bomb OW2 (which- c’mon, really?) will actually read this review, or take it seriously. I also know that out of the few who may read it, many will not change their view, even though I’m trying to be as neutral as possible. But I just hope that I could convince at least some people that the two games, as well as their communities, can co-exist, just as many competitors have done before. Heck, even the devs of both games are fine with each other- so why can’t both fandoms here do the same? And as mentioned before, it's only a percentage of both communities that keep this war alive. So with that, I hope this feud can end, and that each other can talk about, or play each other's games with a clear mind and neutral perspective, for some people being for the first time.

I know this "review" is likely going to be given the clown reaction several times, as well as hate comments. But nonetheless, feel free to give your own thoughts on what I've said, or your opinion on the whole TF2 vs OW thing- just of course, try to keep things civil and respect others who reply. We don't need to create a mini battlefield in the replies. There's enough of those on this topic.

Oh- I have enough space for an actual review.

Overwatch used to be a lot better, but things eventually started going downhill, while the higher-ups refused (and still refuse) to listen to players and kept ruining the game (okay they listened to some things, like changing how to activate the character Lifeweaver's primary and secondary fire)… the devs, artists, and animators are doing an amazing job, with putting in the hard work, making stunning animated shorts and are keeping the game from turning into a complete dumpster fire. Even though the game has turned p2w, a large chunk of pve has been removed (it’s now just paid archive missions- also RIP skill tree), and making us realize that lootboxes aren’t the worst way to gain rewards, it’s still pretty fun to play, especially with friends. Of course, there are better pvp shooters out there, like [insert any pvp shooter other than TF2 because that would probably be funny], but it still has its unique charm. I especially love how vibrant the world is, as well as how futuristic everything is. I also like how unique each character is gameplay-wise, not just how they play, but also how they feel. And even though the releases of new info have been pretty staggered, I like the lore of the game’s world, as well as how each character ties into it. The game may now just be a shadow of its greater self, but is still worth trying out.

Начну с того давно играю в эту игру дуо пати. 
Тем тут несколько, начну с них: 
1. Пришедшие безрукие.
2. Больше БОЛЬШЕ ДОНАТАААА.
3. Скрытый пул. 
4. Пожелания.

1. До выхода 2 части, тут почти не встречалось клинических идиотов. После выхода Overwatch 2.pay в обычный мм стало трудно играть, так как люди согласно своего графику аутизма, бегут вперед без команды и фидят. Таким сложно что либо объяснить ведь если что, пишут it's qp и тд, на что я теперь уже пишу таким что их место в играх с ботами или в мастерской. Я как и крупная часть игроков 1 овера, играю только в qp потому что быстро находить, карты не такие долгие. И с наплывом одноруких, играть в него стало уже невозможно.

2.Близзард aka Пидрар контора, начали начиная с 2pay версии, клепать только донат, а за всё время полученные скины бесплатно я могу посчитать на одной руке.(старые скины с твитча не в счёт). Появились баттлпассы в которые обязательно стали всучивать неподходящие по стилистике скины, а подходящие улетали за бабки в магазине.

3. В феврале этого года вообще попал в скрытый пул 2 репутации(скрытно без оповещений дали 0 ранг), ну вот тогда пошло поехало, границы убраны, и можно каждого обсирать за его конкретную криворукость, приводящим к лузстрикам. И эти ущербы как и подобает, имеют безмерное эго и мнение что они ничем не хуже обычных игроков поколения Overwatch 1. К слову. До скрытого пула, я прямо никого не обсирал, а просил например сменить вдову, не говоря ему что он криворукий на ней(как теперь могу в пуле говорить), часто прилетали оповещения что мои репорты сработали на неадекватов.

4. Желаю здоровья всем кто играет в овер до сих пор, или ушёл из него. Оверу окончательно прогореть. А близзам полную перестановку в кадрах, с возвратом ушедших(Да да, Каплан, Маккри и других вернуть в родные края). А там уже видно будет что делать с трупом.
